inclusion.criterion: ischemic stroke patients admitted to Acute Stroke Unit at Asan Medical Center
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ischemic stroke patients older than 20 years old
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who cannot explain the symptom onset due to altered consciousness, aphasia, or cognitive decline
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop, slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, hypothyroidism, smoker, unknown family history.
